GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
net: wwan: mhi: fix memory leak in mhi_mbim_dellink

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 2845bc9070cef0c651987487d84d4813d64675dd, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit aa730a9905b7b079ef2fffdab7f15dbb842f5c7c. For more details please see the references link.
